name: Melos
description:
Picture Archaic Greece.

A strange and ambivalent time and land. Most of the country is uncivilized, a chain of city-states, yet the isles on the other side of the sea have been colonized. Socrate's great-great-grandfather is not born yet, but art is flourishing and the Odyssey a scholar classic. Many conceptions about Ancient Greece are already true, but much more are not, for the best and the worst.

Melos is a short interactive story (around 10,000 words for 6 endings) about romance, poetry and honesty in this world at the meeting point between myth and history.

Art by Katta. See credits file for all other contributors. Game originally made for the Yuri Game Jam of 2015.

HTML version (courtesy of Nine Square Zone) now available at http://sandbox-adventure.com/melos/

Android version (courtesy of Godline) now available at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=melo...
